p: All seven individuals with seroconversion were linked to care and achieved viral suppression with a mean time of 70 (14–158) days post anonymous HIV reactive result (Fig. 1). The mean time for patient linkage to care was 20 (0–49) days and time to in-care viral suppression was 50 (14–125) days. Only 53% (17 of 32) of the SSP participants with previously diagnosed HIV achieved viral suppression by the end of the investigation period.
